Easy No-Cook Pizza Sauce


Ingredients
1 (28 ounce) can unsalted crushed tomatoes
1/4 cup tomato paste
2 teaspoons sugar
1 teaspoon salt
2 tablespoons basil leaves, or 1 teaspoon dried
1 teaspoon dried oregano
1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper
1 clove garlic, finely minced
1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil

Cooking Instructions

Combine tomatoes, tomato paste, sugar, salt, basil, oregano,
black pepper, garlic, and olive oil in a bowl; stir until
well blended. Add to pizza as desired or store in
refrigerator in an airtight container until ready to use, up
to 10 days.
